headline.print_headline: Historians Reject Move to Condemn Israel
headline.main: Historian Group Rejects a Resolution Condemning Israel

snippet: Members of the American Historical Association, the nation’s largest organization for professional historians, rejected a resolution condemning what was characterized as Israel’s interference with the right to education for Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza.
abstract: Members of the American Historical Association, the nation’s largest organization for professional historians, rejected a resolution condemning what was characterized as Israel’s interference with the right to education for Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza.
